EmailTemplate.subject: Your Imc CAM Connection - December Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
November 2011 Edition (http://offers.tritech.com/Imc_CC_Dec11_Main.html) Welcome to the December issue of Imc Solutions' CAM Connection newsletter. The main page gives you an overall glance at what this month's newsletter has to offer. We hope you enjoy it.
Important Alerts & Updates (http://offers.tritech.com/Imc_CC_Dec11_AlertUpdates.html)

> Imc Solutions' Support Renewal Payment Policy Notification
> Submit Your Product Enhancement Requests Online
> TriTech's Imc and ProQA Offer EMS Mandate Solution

> Steve Damren, Sr Systems Specialist at Somerset County in Maine [DEMO]
> Fix It with Felicia – Next Session Thursday, December 8th
